name: KillerKitty
description:
During the night the mice appear. Kill 30 mice and the fridge will open, and the cat will be able to drink some milk.

This game was made by sinithparanga, his first game and long time dream, and his daughter who did the background and final animation, as a product of the Beginners Gam Jam 2022.

Thank you for playing. 

Instructions

  • Move with Left-Right (A-D)
  • Jump with Up (W)
  • Attack with Space

Open the fridge with more than 30 mouses in your death count.

  • Killed mice : +1
  • Unkilled mice: -1

Sound Credits:

Sunset Landscape by Keys of Moon | https://soundcloud.com/keysofmoon Music promoted by https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/ Creative Commons CC BY 4.0 https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ Powerful Trap Beat | Strong by Alex-Productions | https://onsound.eu/ Music promoted by https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/ Creative Commons CC BY 3.0 https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/ Sound Effect from Pixabay

ChangeLog:

v1.2:

  • during the day you can drink water by clicking the "down" or "S" key. just animation, nothing else
  • the winning sound got reduced by 50%
  • thanks for the feedback

v1.1:

  • fixed Resolution Bug in the UI
  • attacking was preventing damage in some cases, some tweaking there
  • you win the game now with 30 deaths, not 31.
